<H1 CLASS="western">Glossary</H1>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<TABLE WIDTH=643 BORDER=1 BORDERCOLOR="#000000" CELLPADDING=4 CELLSPACING=0>
	<COL WIDTH=153>
	<COL WIDTH=472>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncSharp</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Name of our sync tool</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncTask</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Configuration file that contains source and target directory
			information to be synchronized</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>SyncProfile</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Contains list of SyncTasks for a Particular PC/Laptop</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>FileUnit</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Abstract representation of a file or folder, contains
			information such as name, size, hash code, last modified date,
			etc.</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>PlugSync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>A feature in our program. Program will run by itself while the
			USB is plugged into a computer. Upon execution, the program will
			count down for 5 seconds waiting for user interruption. If there
			is no interruption, the program will automatically try to perform
			all the saved SyncTask.</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>1 way sync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Update destination directory to have the same content as source
			directory</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>2 ways sync</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Update source and destination directories to have the same
			state</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Report/Logger</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Log file that records the operations perform in the
			synchronization process</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Target</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>The destination directory to be sync or compared</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Detector</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>The sub-system that detect changes of the source or destination
			directory</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>Reconciler</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>The sub-system that resolves conflicts between the source &amp;
			destination directories</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD WIDTH=153>
			<P><B>TaskSettings</B></P>
		</TD>
		<TD WIDTH=472>
			<P>Contains configuration settings made for each SyncTask</P>
		</TD>
	</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
</BODY>
